TextView.android:text:
Goal: fulfill the phase requirements to phase then get rid of all cards. Try to be the first to complete all 10 phases.
 What is a set? Multiple cards of the same number.
 What is a run? A set of cards with their numbers incrementing.
 What to do on your turn:
 1) Draw a card by tapping either the discard or draw piles (the two cards in the center of the screen that are face up and face down respectively)
 2) If you have cards that match the FULL requirements for the phase, select them all and tap 'Play Phase'
 3) If you have already phased (including in this turn), hit on yourself or other players by
 selecting a card that could add to the phase requirements and click the designated hit button for that player (Repeat until you have no more hits). 4) Discard a card you don't want by selecting it and pressing 'Discard'
 Once one player has run out of cards, the other player(s) will get one more chance to get rid of their cards before the round advances.
 If you did not finish your phase that round, you will have to try to do the same phase the next round with new cards.
 Points are added for leftover cards each round.
 If two players finish phase 10 on the same round, the one with fewer points wins.
